info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 8:14PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County.
For the Jacks Fork River...including Alley Spring, Eminence...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Jacks Fork at Alley Spring.
* WHEN...From late tonight to Monday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water impacts Alley Spring Campground. Water is one foot in depth at the 600, 800 and 900 loop camp sites.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 9.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning to 6.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will rise to flood stage. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 815 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING
